description: Load Upper Immediate - Writes sign extended 20 bit immediate, left-shifted by 12 bits to target register rd
Add Upper Immediate to PC and store in register
Jump and link - add immediate to pc and change pc
Jump and link register - pc becomes register + 5
Branch if Equal
Branch if not Equal
Branch if Less Than
Branch if Greater Than or Equal
Branch if Less than Unsigned input
Branch if Greater Than or Equal Unisgned Input
Load Byte - load 1 byte into register
Load Half-word - load 2 bytes into register
Load Word - load 4 bytes into register
Load Byte - load 1 byte that is sign extended into register
Load Half-word - load 2 bytes that is sign extended into register
Store byte - store least significant bytes in register into memory
Store half-word - store least 2 significant bytes in register
Store word - store register (4 bytes) into memory
Add immediate - add register and immediate and store in a register
Set If Less Than, immediate - set target register to 1 if register is less than sign-extended immediate
Set If Less Than, immediate - set target register to 1 if register is less than zero-extended immediate
EXclusive OR immediate - Exclusive or register and immediate and store in a register
Or immediate - Bitwise-Or register and immediate and store in destination register
And Immediate - Bit-wise and immediate and store in destination register
Shift Less Than
